## Validate.toConditionSetHash() function

Converts a string to a [ConditionSetHash](./ts-res.conditionsethash.md) if it is a valid condition set hash.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toConditionSetHash(hash: string): Result<ConditionSetHash>;
```

Result&lt;[ConditionSetHash](./ts-res.conditionsethash.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [ConditionSetHash](./ts-res.conditionsethash.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
